english_translation:
It would be good if the meaning of this statement may become evident to Venerable S?riputta. (so that he could explain it to us)
fig: It would be good if Ven. S?riputta would explain the meaning of this statement.
Wholesome states of mind increase more and more.
You see, ?nanda, a course of speech

class_example: dh?rehi, bhikkhu, uddesa? ca vibha?ga? ca
english_translation: Remember, monk, the summary and the analysis.
The path of practice is conducive for calmness, full awakening [and] total emancipation.
You ask, householder: “…views arise in the world…”

class_example: ta? su??hi, s?dhuka? manasi karohi, bh?siss?mi
english_translation: Listen to that, pay attention, I will speak.
Remaining there, he reaches the destruction of the defilements.
